name: Phantasy Star Universe
description: Phantasy Star Universe est  un Action-RPG avec deux modes bien distincts : un mode Histoire complet qui se joue enti√®rement en solo et un mode multijoueurs en ligne, un mode relativement proche de celui de Phantasy Star Online(PSO).
content:
arch: win32
exe: prefix/drive_c/Program Files/Codemasters/Overlord/Launcher.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Windows Version to XP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: directmusic
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Direct Music
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: directplay
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Direct Play
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9_36
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- insert-disc:
    requires: autorun.exe
- task:
    executable: $DISC/autorun.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Windows Version to XP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
